name: Vampire Thrall
description: A medium humanoid serving as a minion to powerful vampires, exhibiting heightened speed and stealth with a capability to climb surfaces easily.
memorable: Highly reliant on vampire blood for maintaining its powers. Becomes weakened in sunlight and can regenerate hit points.
goals: To serve its vampire master and protect it in battle.
relations: Often found alongside more powerful vampires.
environment: Typically found in dark places where vampires reside.
strengths: Enhanced mobility and regeneration capabilities, excels in stealth.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and sunlight; abilities diminish without regular consumption of vampire blood.
attacks: Can perform a multiattack with a rapier, dealing piercing damage effectively.
most_powerful_ability: Repay the Gift, allowing it to sacrifice its own health to save a nearby vampire.
senses: Possesses darkvision, perceiving well in dim light and darkness.
skills: Notably skilled in Stealth, enabling it to surprise enemies.
additional_information: Can climb difficult surfaces without difficulty.
Becomes poisoned and loses traits if it doesn't consume vampire blood weekly.
Suffers from Sunlight Sensitivity, impacting attack rolls and perception.
